props.name: msg
props.desc: The text to display in a centered loading message box (defaults to 'Loading...')

props.name: msgCls
props.desc: The CSS class to apply to the loading message element (defaults to "x-mask-loading")

props.name: removeMask
props.desc:
True to create a single-use mask that is automatically destroyed after loading (useful for page loads),
False to persist the mask element reference for multiple uses (e.g., for paged data widgets).  Defaults to false.
